name: Path to Argon
description:
Guide our hero on his quest to become something more along the Path to Argon!  Complete 18 levels of particle busting fun!

This game was written for the Tiger_J(am) #2 by Eric P Smith with music and SFX composed by Ryan Udairam.

PLAY AND CONTROL TUTORIAL IS IN THE GAME

Credits:

Atma font is from 1001 Free Fonts.

Post Jam:

- Fixed Chlorine.

- Added open sequence skip button if you had already watched it.

- Added Windows, Linux and Mac builds.

- Fixed Argon.
